_sText:
Ski down the hill and fight your enemies. Same ski map with additions and edits for the christmas season to add some christmas spirit. Please don't play this version of ski mountain long after christmas is over lol... 
Changelist:
Added snow effects at bottom
Brightened lights inside to make more visible
Added christmas presents conceiling the weapons
Added candy canes that spawn around the map randomly timed 30secs-2mins that heal for 50 hp when grabbed
Added christmas tree inside building
Added presents around tree with defuser kit and famas
Added fireplace inside
Added christmas colors to my signature in map

This is my christmas present to you all enjoy.

Set up for 64 spawns
Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here by messaging me here or finding me in game. My steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918
Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on similar ideas ect..
